name: Powelus's Audio Visualizer
detailed_description:
About


Powelus's Audio Visualizer allows any person to customize visualizer to their own experience.
The software has the capability to load local MP3 files and display audio spectrum during real-time playback.

Features


Users are able to customize every possible aspect of the visualizer, including:

  • Movement speed and intensity
  • Light source speed and intensity
  • Radius
  • Color
  • Custom logo and background
  • Adjust the frequency range
  • And many more for users to discover

With these abilities, users can record the screen and edit the values, but the UI won't be visible in the final recording.

*Work in progress, may not represent final look*

short_description: Powelus's Audio Visualizer allows any person to customize visualizer to their own experience. The software has the capability to load local MP3 files and display audio spectrum during real-time playback.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4210U / AMD A8-3850
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 820M 2GB / AMD Radeon 520
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8500 / AMD Ryzen 3 1500x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050ti 4GB / AMD RX560 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
